original_title: Dir En Grey - Arche At Nippon Budokan
overview: Features a two-day concert held by DIR EN GREY at Nippon Budokan on February 5 and 6, 2016. Contains all the 44 songs performed by them at the concerts including "[KR] cube," "CHILD PREY,"and "MARMALADE CHAINSAW." Limited edition comes with a bonus DVD featuring bonus video footage (subject to change) and a CD.
title: Dir En Grey - Arche At Nippon Budokan
